content: > **if you love this design please help us by adding it to your ravelry favorites and sharing it on your favorite social media facebook instagram twitter pinterest etc thank you ** this simple wrap combines two fundamentals of knitting stocking stitch and reverse stocking stitch to create a reversible texture it is knitted on the bias increasing in width as you go so you can make it any size you like and you never have to worry about running out of yarn the pattern may look long and complicated but it isn t it s just written with detail for inexperienced knitters **size** - 82 /205cm long from tip to tip - 20 /50cm deep at longest point **materials** - quince & co kestrel 5 skeins colour ebb tide 70m/50g 100% linen tape - 6mm/us10-24 circular needles you can go up to a 7mm/us10 75mm needle **notions** - locking stitch markers optional - tapestry needle - blocking materials wires pins and mats optional but useful to really stretch the fabric **gauge** 11 sts & 18 row = 4 /10cm after blocking **projects** ** light blue version is made with berroco vivo 1 ** - 2 skeins ** 3541 morning dew 2 ** and 2 skeins ** 3533 rain 3 ** - 5 5mm/us9 needles ** red/jade version is made with berroco summer sesame 4 ** - 2 skeins ** 5253 blaze 5 ** and 2 skeins ** 5256 jade 6 ** - 6 5mm/us10 5 needles 1 https //www ravelry com/projects/knitomatic/beach-wrap-4 2 https //knitomatic com/collections/yarn/products/berroco-vivo 3 https //knitomatic com/collections/yarn/products/berroco-vivo 4 https //www ravelry com/projects/knitomatic/beach-wrap-3 5 https //knitomatic com/collections/yarn/products/berroco-summer-sesame-pre-order 6 https //knitomatic com/collections/yarn/products/berroco-summer-sesame-pre-order
